item.title: New Website
item.dc:creator: VidyaGameMaka
item.description: I’ve been gearing up to make new Godot 4 C# tutorials and thought about how I could put a website […]
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been gearing up to make new Godot 4 C# tutorials and thought about how I could put a website together that had everything linked together in a sensible way. So, I just went ahead and put it up onto github like everything else.

I put a good amount of thought pertaining to the display of this site and made sure to offer the option to change between light and dark mode.
